content: I cannot really form an opinion, but i can say that for many bands and artists, putting on a major concert is worth the effort, as it is a crucial part of their career and provides them with an opportunity to connect with their fans and showcase their music to a larger audience. major concerts allow bands to create a memorable experience for their fans, and they often generate significant revenue for the band, their crew, and the production team. additionally, major concerts are an important way for artists to promote their music and connect with new audiences, which can lead to increased album sales, radio play, and other opportunities in the music industry. overall, putting on a major concert requires a significant amount of effort, but it can also provide significant benefits for the band and their career.
